body:
i'm thankful that we decided that miso didn't need her play pen anymore, since we had been leaving its door open all the time except when we eat dinner and we have a crate that we can put her in during that time. i'm thankful to be happy at all the floor real estate in our living room we have gotten back from putting away the crate and am happy that she seems happy as well, since there is much more room for her to run and play and chase her tail.

i'm thankful that miso has started peeing in our yard when i take her out first thing in the morning rather than making us walk further. i'm thankful that though d has a cold, i haven't caught it yet and (knock on wood) hopefully won't catch it. i'm thankful that we got her lots of medicine and cough drops (i'm thankful for the cvs brand pumpkin spice cough drops, which were so ridiculous). i'm thankful that the pharmacist showed us pictures of the new puppies she got for her children to help them recover after a dark moment in their lives.

i'm thankful that my [chamomile tea](https://twitter.com/chuuzus/status/1053411465233883136) is ready and it is time to start my day.
